title: Talon Ultimate Bug

embed.description: Talon's ultimate ability has recently been nerfed, where the mana cost has increased to 100 mana. This patch has come with a bug, where the mana cost is actually reapplied to close his ultimate. ---------------------------------------------------- This video was recorded using Debut Video Capture Software http://www.nchsoftware.com/capture/

replies.body:
Hey ItzBongoz! 

Thank you for the report! Looks like we're aware of this issue and are working to get a fix in ASAP! :D
